DOC.brief_summary: Safety profile flibanserin 28 additional week Distribution prefer dose regimen
DOC.brief_title: Flibanserin Evaluation Over 28 Additional Weeks Hypoactive Sexual Desire Disorder
DOC.criteria: Women primary diagnosis HSDD still need treated accord investigator 's opinion willing continue study . This continuation require adequate compliance , Investigators judgement , trial medication trial visit require parent clinical trial ( Visit 1 visit 9 ) . Patients must use medically acceptable method contraception [ i.e. , double barrier method ( e.g. , diaphragm condom spermicide ) , hormonal therapy ( subcutaneous , injectable , intravaginal , oral contraceptive ) , intrauterine device , tubal sterilization , partner 's surgical sterilization ] least 3 month Screen Visit continue use medically acceptable method contraception trial . Patients history MDD within 6 month prior Screen Visit score 14 Beck Depression Inventory II , history suicide attempt accord Beck Scale Suicide Ideation , patient nonzero statement first five item Beck Scale Suicide Ideation . Patients must clinically acceptable Pap smear read cytology facility ( evidence malignancy squamous intraepithelial lesion ) within 6 month Inclusion Visit . Patients finding Screen Visit pelvic inflammatory disease , urinary tract vaginal infection/vaginitis , cervicitis , interstitial cystitis , vulvodynia , significant vaginal atrophy . Patients experience major life stress ( include parent pressure , eldercare , loss income , death family member , etc . ) relationship discord could interfere sexual activity , except distress HSDD . Clinically significant ECG abnormality Screen Visit , accord investigator opinion cardiologist perform ECG . The following ECG value consider exclusionary : QTc interval > 480 millisecond ( m ) , PR interval > 240 m , QRS interval > 110 m .
